module.name: Ft.Xml.Xslt.Exslt.Dynamic
module.abstract: EXSLT 2.0 - Dyanmic (http://www.exslt.org/dyn/index.html) WWW: http://4suite.org/XSLT e-mail: support@4suite.org
module.description: Copyright (c) 2001 Fourthought Inc, USA. All Rights Reserved. See http://4suite.org/COPYRIGHT for license and copyright information

function.name: Closure
function.abstract: The dyn:closure function creates a node set resulting from transitive closure of evaluating the expression passed as the second argument on each of the nodes passed as the first argument, then on the node set resulting from that and so on until no more nodes are found.

function.name: Evaluate
function.abstract: The dyn:evaluate function evaluates a string as an XPath expression and returns the resulting value, which might be a boolean, number, string, node set, result tree fragment or external object. The sole argument is the string to be evaluated.

function.name: Map
function.abstract: The dyn:map function evaluates the expression passed as the second argument for each of the nodes passed as the first argument, and returns a node set of those values.

function.name: Max
function.abstract: The dyn:max function calculates the maximum value for the nodes passed as the first argument, where the value of each node is calculated dynamically using an XPath expression passed as a string as the second argument.

function.name: Min
function.abstract: The dyn:min function calculates the minimum value for the nodes passed as the first argument, where the value of each node is calculated dynamically using an XPath expression passed as a string as the second argument.

function.name: Sum
function.abstract: The dyn:sum function calculates the sum for the nodes passed as the first argument, where the value of each node is calculated dynamically using an XPath expression passed as a string as the second argument.

global.name: ExtFunctions
global.value: {('http://exslt.org/dynamic', 'closure'): <function Closure>, ('http://exslt.org/dynamic', 'evaluate'): <function Evaluate>, ('http://exslt.org/dynamic', 'map'): <function Map>, ('http://exslt.org/dynamic', 'max'): <function Max>, ('http://exslt.org/dynamic', 'min'): <function Min>, ('http://exslt.org/dynamic', 'sum'): <function Sum>}
